forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind 5 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As evening descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the city settles into a soothing embrace of partly cloudy skies, with temperatures gracefully hovering around the mid-fifties. A gentle west-southwest breeze whispers through the streets, offering a refreshing touch against the cool air that lingers. The view of the Golden Gate Bridge remains mostly clear, though a hint of the marine layer looms in the distance, subtly softening the horizon—a reminder of the bay's ever-changing character.

As dawn breaks on Thursday, optimism reigns with mostly sunny skies anticipated, punctuated by a high near 65. The pleasant warmth will gradually give way to cooler temperatures in the afternoon, making layers a wise choice for those venturing out. A light jacket or a cozy sweater would complement an easy stroll through Golden Gate Park or perhaps a leisurely coffee at an outdoor café. The forecast whispers invitations to embrace the burgeoning day, whether it's capturing the city's vibrant energy on foot or sharing moments with friends as the sun stretches across the bay.
